name: lucrativeness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of producing a lot of money: The global lucrativeness of the illegal ivory trade is well documented. The report sheds light on the lucrativeness of the market. See
lucrative
More examplesFewer examplesThe way you communicate with the client determines the strength and potential lucrativeness of the working relationship. Ever since she discovered the lucrativeness of this trade, she has converted most of her money into cryptocurrencies.Due to the lucrativeness of the crop, it has the potential to contribute to the growth of the economy.
